content:
The Israeli FHIR Community is scaling up and looking for leading FHIR professional experts and consultants, to help our community members build their FHIR strategy and work plans and to advise and lead new work groups.

Please follow the link for more information https://bit.ly/3orBqtb
This topic was moved here from #Announcements > Israel FHIR community looking for consultants by Lloyd McKenzie
